sys_metadata_link.payload: .fd-ex-string { margin-bottom: 15px; } .fd-ex-string input { box-sizing: border-box; border: 4px solid #C4D0D6; border-radius: 4px; background-color: #F9FDFF; padding: 5px 50px 5px 15px; width: 100%; } .fd-ex-icon { position: absolute; font-size: 25px; right: 10px; top: 26px; opacity: 0.5; color: red; } .df_fdExampleStringField .fd-ex-string { margin-bottom: 15px; } .df_fdExampleStringField .fd-ex-string input { box-sizing: border-box; border: 4px solid #C4D0D6; border-radius: 4px; background-color: #F9FDFF; padding: 5px 50px 5px 15px; width: 100%; } .df_fdExampleStringField .fd-ex-icon { position: absolute; font-size: 25px; right: 10px; top: 26px; opacity: 0.5; color: red; } fdExampleStringField fd_example_string_field fd-example-string-field admin 2017-08-30 07:12:46 f827cb834ff08300ab4450af0310c705 19 admin 2017-10-31 05:20:37 #f9fdff true image/png screenshot 96 388 4716 4287 admin 2017-08-30 07:18:06 0758c7c34ff08300ab4450af0310c752 2 admin 2017-08-30 07:18:06 ZZ_YYx_pisn_fd_directive f827cb834ff08300ab4450af0310c705 H4sIAAAAAAAAAA== 16 0 0758c7c34ff08300ab4450af0310c752 admin 2017-08-30 07:18:06 4758c7c34ff08300ab4450af0310c752  3736 1 0758c7c34ff08300ab4450af0310c752 admin 2017-08-30 07:18:06 c758c7c34ff08300ab4450af0310c752  1972 2 0758c7c34ff08300ab4450af0310c752 admin 2017-08-30 07:18:06 4b58c7c34ff08300ab4450af0310c752
